Name: Electric Radar
Description: Electric Radar General Category Deployables Tech Tier Tier 4 Required Level 30 Description A portable topographical radar unit powered by Electricity, angers local wildlife when active. Flavor Text Connect this baby up to a generator and you are good to go.
